name: zodipus-example-basic-usage
description: Basic usage example of Zodipus generator

scripts.db:start: docker run --name zodipus-example-db -e POSTGRES_DB=zodipus_example -e POSTGRES_USER=zodipus_example -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=zodipus_example_password -p 5434:5432 -d postgres:16
scripts.db:reset: pnpm db:stop && pnpm db:remove && pnpm db:start && sleep 2 && pnpm db:push
scripts.setup: pnpm db:start && sleep 2 && pnpm db:push && pnpm db:generate
